com.bumptech.glide.manager
Interface LifecycleListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
ConnectivityMonitor, FutureTarget<R>, Target<R>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AppWidgetTarget, BaseTarget, BitmapImageViewTarget, DrawableImageViewTarget, GlideDrawableImageViewTarget, ImageViewTarget, NotificationTarget, PreloadTarget, RequestFutureTarget, RequestManager, SimpleTarget, ViewTarget
public interface LifecycleListener

An interface for listener to Fragment and Activity lifecycle events.

Method Summary
